settings.name: Balakrishna Goud Malela
settings.title: Looking for Software Engineer roles
settings.summary: Aspiring Software Engineer currently pursuing Master's in Computer Science at Texas Tech University, passionate about building scalable and efficient applications.

about.title: About Me
about.content: Results-driven Software Engineer with hands-on experience delivering enterprise solutions at Newgen Software, where I improved document processing speeds by 40% for the State Bank of India. Currently pursuing my Master’s in Computer Science at Texas Tech University (3.5 GPA), I combine academic excellence with expertise in full-stack development, database optimization, and automation testing. Seeking software engineering opportunities to leverage my technical skills in Java, Python, JavaScript, and Oracle SQL to drive measurable impact through innovative solutions.

items.description: Developed and optimized the Document Generation feature for the Agricultural Loan Origination System (ALOS) using robust software development practices, improving document processing speed for the State Bank of India. Collaborated with a cross-functional team of 10+ engineers using Agile methodologies, ensuring seamless integration of document workflows into the banking system. Implemented efficient Oracle database queries, leveraging SQL expertise to reduce response time.

Gained hands-on experience with iBPS (Intelligent Business Process Suite) while designing, coding, and testing workflow automation solutions, thereby improving business process efficiency. Assisted in debugging and optimizing enterprise-level applications, ensuring a 99.9% uptime for critical banking services and demonstrating strong problem-solving skills in software development.

items.title: QuizBot - AI-Powered Network Security Learning Tool
items.description: Developed QuizBot using Streamlit and local LLMs (Ollama) to create interactive quizzes and free-form Q&A with PDF context. Features include automatic evaluation, color-coded feedback, and a sleek Streamlit UI with CLI support.

items.title: A Textbook Remedy for Domain Shifts - Medical Image Analysis
items.description: Implemented a knowledge-enhanced bottleneck model (KnoBo) to improve robustness of medical image analysis against domain shifts. Evaluated across multiple datasets, achieving significant improvements in out-of-domain performance.

items.title: RentalsBook - Car Rental Management System
items.description: Designed and developed a scalable web application for car rental bookings using PHP, MySQL, JavaScript, HTML, and CSS. Integrated secure authentication and an admin dashboard, improving booking efficiency.

items.title: Automation Testing Utility for Dynamic GUI Interfaces
items.description: Developed a modular automation testing tool using Playwright and Python to validate dynamic UI workflows including authentication, navigation, and form inputs. Integrated reporting and structured test execution to improve regression testing efficiency and reduce manual QA efforts.

items.title: SBI Agricultural Loan Origination System (ALOS)
items.description: Led the Document Generation feature development, utilizing HTML, CSS, JavaScript, and Oracle. Optimized document handling workflows, enhancing operational efficiency.

items.degree: Bachelor of Technology, Electronics and Communication Engineering
